nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 隶属中国人民解放军东部战区陆军，军部驻地福建省厦门市，被称为“对台一线部队”。在2017年深化国防和军队改革中，以原陆军第三十一集团军为基础调整组建。
description.en: Subordinate to the PLA Eastern Theater Command Ground Force, with its headquarters in Xiamen, Fujian, and known as a 'front-line unit for Taiwan'. It was formed in April 2017 based on the former 31st Group Army during the military reform.

description.zh-cn: 1985年由陆军第三十一军改编而成。2017年4月，在深化国防和军队改革中，以其为基础调整组建为陆军第七十三集团军。
description.en: Reorganized from the 31st Corps in 1985. In April 2017, it was reorganized into the 73rd Group Army during the deepening of national defense and military reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 前身为华东野战军第13纵队，1949年2月改编为第三十一军。长期驻防福建厦门，1985年改编为陆军第三十一集团军。
description.en: Its predecessor was the 13th Column of the East China Field Army. It was reorganized into the 31st Corps in February 1949. It was stationed in Xiamen, Fujian for a long time and was reorganized into the 31st Group Army in 1985.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区的陆军组成部分，领导和指挥战区内陆军部队。
description.en: The ground force component of the PLA Eastern Theater Command, responsible for leading and commanding army units within the theater.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，2022年4月起担任第七十三集团军军长。
description.en: A major general in the PLA Ground Force, serving as the commander of the 73rd Group Army since April 2022.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，2020年起担任第七十三集团军政治委员。
description.en: A major general in the PLA Ground Force, serving as the political commissar of the 73rd Group Army since 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中国福建省下辖的副省级市，是第七十三集团军及其前身部队的长期驻地。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Fujian Province, China, and the long-term garrison location for the 73rd Group Army and its predecessor units.

description.zh-cn: 第七十三集团军的前身部队，如华东野战军第13纵队和第三十一军，曾参与此次内战中的多场关键战役。
description.en: The predecessor units of the 73rd Group Army, such as the 13th Column of the East China Field Army and the 31st Corps, participated in several key campaigns of this civil war.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一。其第13纵队是陆军第三十一军的前身。
description.en: One of the main forces of the PLA during the Second Chinese Civil War. Its 13th Column was the predecessor of the 31st Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任华东野战军第13纵队司令员和改编后的第三十一军首任军长。
description.en: PLA general who served as the commander of the 13th Column of the East China Field Army and the first commander of the reorganized 31st Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任华东野战军第13纵队政治委员。
description.en: PLA general who served as the political commissar of the 13th Column of the East China Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间的一场重要战役，华东野战军第13纵队参与此战。
description.en: An important campaign during the Second Chinese Civil War, in which the 13th Column of the East China Field Army participated.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战“三大战役”之一，华东野战军第13纵队参与此战。
description.en: One of the three major campaigns of the Second Chinese Civil War, in which the 13th Column of the East China Field Army participated.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第三野战军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三野战军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，由华东野战军改编而成。第三十一军曾隶属于其第十兵团。
description.en: One of the main forces of the PLA during the Second Chinese Civil War, reorganized from the East China Field Army. The 31st Corps was subordinate to its 10th Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战末期的决定性战役，第三十一军参与此战。
description.en: A decisive campaign at the end of the Second Chinese Civil War, in which the 31st Corps participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军攻占上海的战役，第三十一军参与此战并在战后因纪律严明受到称赞。
description.en: The campaign for the PLA to capture Shanghai, in which the 31st Corps participated and was praised for its strict discipline afterward.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军攻占福建省会福州的战役，第三十一军是主力之一。
description.en: The campaign for the PLA to capture Fuzhou, the capital of Fujian Province, where the 31st Corps was one of the main forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军攻占漳州和厦门地区的战役，第三十一军是主力之一。
description.en: The campaign for the PLA to capture the Zhangzhou and Xiamen areas, where the 31st Corps was one of the main forces.

description.zh-cn: 1985年中国人民解放军进行的军队改革和员额裁减，在此期间陆军第三十一军改编为陆军第三十一集团军。
description.en: A military reform and troop reduction carried out by the PLA in 1985, during which the 31st Corps was reorganized into the 31st Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 2015年起由习近平主导的新一轮中国人民解放军军事改革，推动了陆军第三十一集团军向第七十三集团军的调整组建。
description.en: A new round of military reform of the PLA led by Xi Jinping starting from 2015, which prompted the reorganization of the 31st Group Army into the 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席。2017年4月，接见了包括第七十三集团军在内的新调整组建的84个军级单位主官。
description.en: General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. In April 2017, he met with the commanders of 84 newly adjusted and formed corps-level units, including the 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任第三十一军政治委员。
description.en: PLA general who served as the political commissar of the 31st Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，担任新组建的第七十三集团军首任军长。
description.en: A major general in the PLA Ground Force, serving as the first commander of the newly formed 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，担任新组建的第七十三集团军首任政治委员。
description.en: A major general in the PLA Ground Force, serving as the first political commissar of the newly formed 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任第三十一军最后一任军长和改编后的第三十一集团军首任军长。
description.en: PLA general who served as the last commander of the 31st Corps and the first commander of the reorganized 31st Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任陆军第三十一集团军军长。
description.en: PLA general who served as the commander of the 31st Group Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军东部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军隶属于东部战区陆军。
description.en: The PLA 73rd Group Army is subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 丁来富自2022年4月起担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军军长。
description.en: Ding Laifu has served as the commander of the PLA 73rd Group Army since April 2022.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 方明自2020年起担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军政治委员。
description.en: Fang Ming has served as the political commissar of the PLA 73rd Group Army since 2020.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中，以原陆军第三十一集团军为基础，调整组建为中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军。
description.en: During the deepening of national defense and military reform, the 73rd Group Army was formed based on the former 31st Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，习近平主导并推动了2015年开始的深化国防和军队改革。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Xi Jinping led and promoted the deepening of national defense and military reform starting in 2015.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军由原陆军第三十一集团军为基础调整组建而成，继承了其历史和荣誉。
description.en: The PLA 73rd Group Army was formed based on the former 31st Group Army, inheriting its history and honors.

description.zh-cn: 在1985年的百万大裁军中，陆军第三十一军改编为陆军第三十一集团军。
description.en: During the one-million troop reduction in 1985, the 31st Corps was reorganized into the 31st Group Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 陆军第三十一集团军由原陆军第三十一军改编而成。
description.en: The 31st Group Army was reorganized from the former 31st Corps.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三十一军由华东野战军第13纵队于1949年2月改编而成。
description.en: The PLA 31st Corps was reorganized from the 13th Column of the East China Field Army in February 1949.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十一军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第三野战军

description.zh-cn: 1949年改编后，第三十一军隶属于第三野战军第十兵团。
description.en: After its reorganization in 1949, the 31st Corps was subordinate to the 10th Army Group of the Third Field Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 周志坚担任中国人民解放军第三十一军首任军长。
description.en: Zhou Zhijian served as the first commander of the PLA 31st Corps.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 陈华堂担任中国人民解放军第三十一军首任政治委员。
description.en: Chen Huatang served as the first political commissar of the PLA 31st Corps.

description.zh-cn: 华东野战军第13纵队（第三十一军前身）参加了济南战役。
description.en: The 13th Column of the East China Field Army (predecessor of the 31st Corps) participated in the Jinan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 华东野战军第13纵队（第三十一军前身）参加了淮海战役。
description.en: The 13th Column of the East China Field Army (predecessor of the 31st Corps) participated in the Huaihai Campaign.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三十一军参加了渡江战役。
description.en: The PLA 31st Corps participated in the Yangtze River Crossing Campaign.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三十一军参加了上海战役。
description.en: The PLA 31st Corps participated in the Shanghai Campaign.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三十一军参加了福州战役。
description.en: The PLA 31st Corps participated in the Fuzhou Campaign.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三十一军参加了漳厦战役。
description.en: The PLA 31st Corps participated in the Zhangzhou-Xiamen Campaign.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 胡中强担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军首任军长。
description.en: Hu Zhongqiang served as the first commander of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 杨诚担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军首任政治委员。
description.en: Yang Cheng served as the first political commissar of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 丁来富接替胡中强担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军军长。
description.en: Ding Laifu succeeded Hu Zhongqiang as the commander of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 方明接替杨诚担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军政治委员。
description.en: Fang Ming succeeded Yang Cheng as the political commissar of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 王昭堃担任中国人民解放军第三十一军最后一任军长。
description.en: Wang Zhaokun served as the last commander of the PLA 31st Corps.

description.zh-cn: 王昭堃担任陆军第三十一集团军首任军长。
description.en: Wang Zhaokun served as the first commander of the 31st Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 陈希滔接替王昭堃担任陆军第三十一集团军军长。
description.en: Chen Xitao succeeded Wang Zhaokun as the commander of the 31st Group Army.
